speaker: Shepherd
text_entry: ACT IV

speaker: Shepherd
text_entry: SCENE I.

speaker: Shepherd
text_entry: Enter Time, the Chorus

speaker: Time
text_entry: I, that please some, try all, both joy and terror

speaker: Time
text_entry: Of good and bad, that makes and unfolds error,

speaker: Time
text_entry: Now take upon me, in the name of Time,

speaker: Time
text_entry: To use my wings. Impute it not a crime

speaker: Time
text_entry: To me or my swift passage, that I slide

speaker: Time
text_entry: O'er sixteen years and leave the growth untried

speaker: Time
text_entry: Of that wide gap, since it is in my power

speaker: Time
text_entry: To o'erthrow law and in one self-born hour

speaker: Time
text_entry: To plant and o'erwhelm custom. Let me pass

speaker: Time
text_entry: The same I am, ere ancient'st order was

speaker: Time
text_entry: Or what is now received: I witness to

speaker: Time
text_entry: The times that brought them in; so shall I do

speaker: Time
text_entry: To the freshest things now reigning and make stale

speaker: Time
text_entry: The glistering of this present, as my tale

speaker: Time
text_entry: Now seems to it. Your patience this allowing,

speaker: Time
text_entry: I turn my glass and give my scene such growing

speaker: Time
text_entry: As you had slept between: Leontes leaving,

speaker: Time
text_entry: The effects of his fond jealousies so grieving

speaker: Time
text_entry: That he shuts up himself, imagine me,

speaker: Time
text_entry: Gentle spectators, that I now may be

speaker: Time
text_entry: In fair Bohemia, and remember well,

speaker: Time
text_entry: I mentioned a son o' the king's, which Florizel

speaker: Time
text_entry: I now name to you; and with speed so pace

speaker: Time
text_entry: To speak of Perdita, now grown in grace

speaker: Time
text_entry: Equal with wondering: what of her ensues

speaker: Time
text_entry: I list not prophecy; but let Time's news

speaker: Time
text_entry: Be known when 'tis brought forth.

speaker: Time
text_entry: A shepherd's daughter,

speaker: Time
text_entry: And what to her adheres, which follows after,

speaker: Time
text_entry: Is the argument of Time. Of this allow,

speaker: Time
text_entry: If ever you have spent time worse ere now;

speaker: Time
text_entry: If never, yet that Time himself doth say

speaker: Time
text_entry: He wishes earnestly you never may.

speaker: Time
text_entry: Exit
